attributes.review: To my fellow trump supporters, this app exited me because we have to help trump win the election. the left is crazy!!! so i wanted to help make america great again by downloading this app and this app isn’t safe at all. it started saying stuff in chinese and i got so scared!!! THEN it started blaring “ FOR 💕 IN ✨ HER 🧚‍♀️ “ and wouldn’t stop until i deleted this app!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD—HOAX!!
attributes.review:
I wanted to use this app and show my support for our King, Donald Trump, but I’m pretty sure this is a FAKE APP! This was created by those DAMNED DEMOCRATS to try and TRICK US into sharing our PERSONAL INFORMATION! 
DO NOT TRUST IT! 
🚨YOUR SECURITY IS AT RISK 🚨

attributes.title: crying and shaking
attributes.review: Just reading the title of the app makes me burst into tears about how people can actually support this man. If you truly consider yourself a patriot, you should know that this man isn’t fit to be president. I am emotionally distressed by this app’s content.

attributes.title: THIS APP WITH DESTROY YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: It took about 100 hours to download and once it was finished I started getting calls and texts in Russian! The app asked for all kinds of personal information which made me feel very violated. The app basically destroyed my phone and I'm just trying to look out for y'all by posting this. Do not download!!

attributes.title: worst app store experience ever
attributes.review: downloading this app was the worst use of data the world has ever seen. i had been excited to stay up to date on election proceedings, but the app took forever to download; when it finally loaded i was unable to sign in or create an account because the page simply froze on the main screen. don’t waste your time on this piece of garbage. i expected better from a presidential product in the app store. zero stars. kanye 2020.

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: If I could give it zero stars, I would. This app took FOREVER to download when I have more than 100 GB’s free. I downloaded it to keep up with “actual” news than that “fake news” CNN. Then it started deleting and getting into my PRIVATE text and giving it to the Chinese government. What kind of president gives us hard working Americans privacy and rights to the commies. Very disappointed in our president

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I was really expecting a lot more but when I first opened the app I notification popped up and that was annoying then it showed me a really ugly picture.

attributes.title: please read, important info 😔💔
attributes.review: okay, so i downloaded this because i most certainly support Rump— er, ‘scuse my slip-up— Trump. i TOTALLY do. definitely. and as soon as i opened it, i got rickrolled 😤😭😭 i am absolutely disgusted. and then, after the video of the legendary Rick Astley went away, it told me that i’m nothing but a stupid shorty??? I. AM. OFFENDED. i’m average height, and Rump is calling me SHORT? my friends are TALL, go insult a mirror you pineapple-orange hybrid monster. so disappointed with this app. do not recommend. seriously, only download to leave a 1 star review to spread the word about this wretched thing 😭😭😖😤😡😡😭😭😭
